original_text: And he took unto him all these, and divided them in the midst, and laid each piece one against another: but the birds divided he not.
korean_text: 아브람이 그 모든 것을 가져다가 그 중간을 쪼개고 그 쪼갠 것을 마주 대하여 놓고 그 새는 쪼개지 아니하였으며

sentences.original_text: And he took unto him all these
and divided them in the midst
and laid each piece one against another
sentences.korean_translation: 각 조각을 서로 마주 보게 놓았으나

sentences.original_text: but the birds divided he not
